name: @probelabs/maid
description: Fast, accurate Mermaid diagram validator (CLI) with clear diagnostics.

scripts.test:errors:sequence: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js sequence
scripts.test:errors:flowchart: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js flowchart
scripts.test:errors:pie: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js pie
scripts.test:errors:all: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js all
scripts.ci:test: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js all && node scripts/test-fixes.js && node scripts/test-cli-fixes.js && node scripts/test-unsupported.js && node scripts/compare-linters.js flowchart && node scripts/compare-linters.js pie && node scripts/compare-linters.js sequence && node scripts/test-renderer-pie.js && node scripts/test-renderer-flowchart.js && node scripts/test-renderer-sequence.js
scripts.compare:renderers:sequence: npm run build && node scripts/compare-renderers-batch.js sequence
scripts.compare:renderers:pie: npm run build && node scripts/compare-renderers-batch.js pie
scripts.compare:renderers:flowchart: npm run build && node scripts/compare-renderers-batch.js flowchart
scripts.lint:valid: for file in test-fixtures/flowchart/valid/*.mmd; do node out/cli.js "$file" || exit 1; done
scripts.lint:invalid: for file in test-fixtures/flowchart/invalid/*.mmd; do node out/cli.js "$file" 2>/dev/null && exit 1 || true; done
scripts.ci:previews:
npm run build && node scripts/generate-previews.js all && git update-index -q --refresh && git diff --exit-code || (echo '
Preview files are outdated. Run: npm run generate:previews' && exit 1)
scripts.compare:renderers:flowchart: npm run build && node scripts/compare-renderers-all.js flowchart

author: Probelabs
